00015 // Number of AMR encoded bytes based on Frame Type along with Frame Header
00016 const UINT16 AMR_SM_WORDS[] = {13,14,16,18,20,21,27,32,5,0,0,0,0,0,0,1};

00018 // Maximum size of the Shared Memory between APOXI & Audio Gati Client
00019 // Support 312 Stereo or 625 Mono Pcm Samples of 16 bits width
00020 #define MAXSHMEMSIZE 200004
00021 
00022 // Number of Frames used to signal Notification event on client side
00023 #define PCM_FILEPLAY_FRAMENUM   6
00024 #define AMR_FILEPLAY_FRAMENUM   6
00025 #define PCM_FILEREC_FRAMENUM    3   
00026 #define AMR_FILEREC_FRAMENUM    3

00028 // Structures for passing driver API parameters to Audio Gati Client
00029 struct PcmParam {
00030     UINT8 handle;
00031     aud_pcm_mode_enum mode;
00032     aud_pcm_sample_rate_enum sample_rate;
00033     UINT8 bit_rate;
00034     aud_media_enum media;
00035     aud_pcm_format_enum format;
00036     UINT16* file_handle;
00037     UINT32 buffer_size;
00038 };
00039 
00040 struct VmParam {
00041     UINT8 handle;
00042     aud_vm_mode_enum vm_mode;
00043     aud_media_enum media;
00044     aud_dsp_format_enum format;
00045     UINT8 rate;
00046     UINT16* file_handle;
00047     UINT16 buffer_size;
00048 };
00049 
00050 struct Mp3Header {
00051     UINT8   mpg_ver;
00052     UINT8   mpg_layer;
00053     UINT8   mpg_pad_bit;
00054     UINT16  mpg_br;
00055     INT     mpg_freq;
00056 };
00057 
00058 struct Mp3Param {
00059         UINT8 handle;
00060         aud_media_enum media;
00061         UINT16* file_handle;
00062         UINT16 buffer_size;
00063         UINT32 id_offset;
00064         UINT32 start_frame;
00065         Mp3Header m_mpghead;
00066 };
